messages.content: Could you please tell me your full name?
Great! Let's move on to your current role. What are your main responsibilities in this role?

Could you please share more details about your role as a PhD researcher? Specifically, could you describe your key responsibilities, the size of your team, and any main achievements you've had in this role?
I have do work on research in the field of AI and machine learning. I work with my professor and two other PhD researchers
Could you please specify the institution you are associated with, elaborate on your key responsibilities, and share some of your main achievements in your current role as a PhD researcher?
I work at hte University of Mons
Could you please elaborate more on your key responsibilities as a PhD researcher and any main achievements you have had in this role?
